name: Reflektor (Yoris)
description:
Reflektor is a puzzle game about using mirrors to reflect a laser and hit the blue target.  

Special thanks to Professeur Gigawatt for all the sounds and music: https://professeurgigawatt.itch.io

It has online servers for level sharing, but level editor is coming next week! 

The game downloads levels over internet, but internet is not required to play(just make sure to download all the levels you want to play before).

This game has been made in a week(June 23rd - June 30th).  Another major update is planned next Sunday (July 7th) 

If you donate you get a supporter tag on all community levels created by you and can suggest new official levels.
